name: ttyd-alpine
short_description: Terminal sharing over web - lightweight Alpine Linux bash shell from browser.
description: ttyd is a terminal sharing tool that gives you a bash shell accessible from any browser. This Alpine Linux version is extremely lightweight. Features include clipboard support, scrollback, SSL/TLS, authentication, and resize handling. Perfect for demos, quick remote access, or running CLI tools without SSH.
usecases: Give browser-based terminal access without SSH configuration.
Demonstrate CLI tools over the web.
Lightweight alternative to full Ubuntu for simple tasks.
